parameters.arguments: -lc "mkdir -p /data/backups && STAMP=$(date +\"%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S\") && BACKUP_DIR=\"/data/backups/$STAMP\" && mkdir -p \"$BACKUP_DIR/workflows\" \"$BACKUP_DIR/credentials\" && n8n export:workflow --all --separate --pretty --output=\"$BACKUP_DIR/workflows\" && n8n export:credentials --all --output=\"$BACKUP_DIR/credentials/credentials.json\" && find /data/backups -maxdepth 1 -type d -mtime +14 -exec rm -rf {} \; || true && echo \"Backup complete: $BACKUP_DIR\""
